ingredients: +   3/4 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 2  eggs, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon almond extract, 3 cups golden raisins,   +   1/2 cup red candied cherries, 1 cup candied mixed fruit peel, 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
